promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a chibi cute strong bear steel-type pokemon wearing ornate armor. It can be found in mountain-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, steel or bear. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Armorling, a a chibi cute strong bear steel-type pokemon. It can be found in mountain-like environments It has the following abilities: Extra-Tight Press. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "bear", "steel" or "Armorling". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of steel-type pokemon, bear-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, grey shadows
generatedDescription: This petite yet mighty ursine creature thrives in rocky terrain, using its Extra-Tight Press ability to crush the toughest ore and playfully roll boulders.
